mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, t.is_deleted, t.gmt_create, t.gmt_modified from hn_tag t where t.id = #{id}
select t.id, t.name, t.is_deleted, t.gmt_create, t.gmt_modified from hn_tag t left join hn_note_to_tag ntg on ntg.tag_id = t.id where ntg.note_id = #{nid} and t.is_deleted = 0
select t.id from hn_tag t where t.name = #{name} and t.uid = #{uid} and t.is_deleted = 0
select t.id, t.name, t.is_deleted, t.gmt_create, t.gmt_modified from hn_tag t where t.uid = #{uid} and t.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into hn_tag( name, uid, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values( #{name}, #{uid}, NOW(), NOW())
insert into hn_note_to_tag( note_id, tag_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values( #{noteId}, #{tagId}, NOW(), NOW())
